name: Puzzle Bots Prototype
description:
Feedback! Whether you enjoyed this game or not, I would appreciate if you could fill out this 1 minute survey.

This is an early prototype of Puzzle Bots! Upload colorful programming blocks into your Bot's memory, execute sequences of blocks, then watch as giant war-machines fight to the death with an array of powerful weapons. 

Controls
Keyboard P1 Keyboard P2 Gamepad(s)Move Block
Left/Down/Right A/S/D Left/Down/Right
Arrows LeftStick or
D-Pad Drop Block W or
Space Up Arrow or
End L/R Shoulder or
A Rotate Block
CCW/CW Q/E,
 Z/C,
</> PgUp/PgDown Left/Right Trigger, 
X/B
